system.description:
With this spell, the caster may blind one victim within 120'. The effect is automaticâ€”no saving throw is allowed. The duration of the blindness depends on the victim's current hit points.

Effect Based on Hit Points:

  • 1-40 HP: Blinded for [[/r 1d4 #Days Blinded]] days.
  • 41-80 HP: Blinded for [[/r 2d4 #Hours Blinded]] hours.
  • 81+ HP: The spell has no effect.

Blinded Condition:

  • Blinded creatures suffer a -4 penalty to all saving throws.
  • Blinded creatures also suffer a +4 penalty to their armor class.

Removing the Blindness:

  • A Cure Blindness or Cureall spell can remove the effect, but only if cast by a cleric whose level is equal to or higher than the caster of Power Word Blind.
system.effect: Blinds 1 creature with 80 HP or less
